item.title: Michael Mcdowell - The Amulet
item.description: This is the first book for the club to read. Will fix this page as I’m setting up the site now. Purchase for Kindle Affiliate Link | [Non-Affiliate Link(https://www.amazon.com/Amulet-Michael-McDowell-ebook/dp/B00D30OXA2/)]
